mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, ctnt, i_user) VALUES (#{title}, #{title}, #{i_user})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.i_user, A.regdt, B.u_nm as WriterNm, B.profileImg FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user ORDER BY iboard DESC;
SELECT A.title, A.regdt, A.i_user, A.ctnt, B.u_nm AS writerNm FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard};
